verbs.description: [ARG0: idaho wildlife official safari photos] [V: spark] [ARG1: an uproar] another controversy is brewing about an american hunter safari in africa this time it involves a fish and game commissioner in idaho named blake fischer who returned from a hunt in namibia with his wife and boasted by email of all the animals he killed with a bow reports the wildlife africa idaho statesman official blake fischer idaho state journal idaho
